greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A220371(n)/(4*A220371(n-1))
comment: This sequence is, via A220371, related to A220002, which is related to the Catalan numbers.
Information about the peculiar structure of the a(n) can be found in A220466.
maple: nmax:= 34: for p from 0 to ceil(simplify(log[2](nmax))) do for n from 1 to ceil(nmax/(p+2)) do a(2^p*(2*n-1)) := 2^p*(2^(2*p+4)*(2*n-1)^2-1) od: od: seq(a(n), n=1..nmax);
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Dec 21 2012
